DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose trial compare Musculoskeletal Obstetric Management ( MOM ) program standard obstetric care alone low back pain/pelvic pain ( LBP/PP ) pregnancy .
DOC.detailed_description: Initially patient Baseline Musculoskeletal Exam ( BME ) 24-28 week pregnancy point self report tests/questionnaires administer well functional testing ( see `` procedure research '' ) perform . At point patient randomize either Standard Obstetric Management Musculoskeletal Obstetric Care ( MOMS ) group : Standard Obstetric Management : All patient ( group ) see standard obstetric care typically every month . Complicated case may need see frequently . There standard obstetric care approach LBP/PP pregnancy , thus , patient standard obstetric care group receive limit , although realistic intervention LBP/PP . In addition , patient attend one-on-one educational session pre-natal care . The woman group minimum 4 pre-natal care session . These visit time match additional time care give MOM group . The timed session compare MOMS group monthly interval maintain treatment attention equality . Patients complete medical assessment include history physical examination administer obstetrical provider . As part intervention LBP/PP , evaluation lifestyle work activity may take consideration . Modification lifestyle may recommend include , rest general aerobic exercise . Short-lived heat treatment ( i.e . heat pad 10 minute ) another possibility . Use analgesia may prescribe , include acetaminophen NSAID preparation , narcotic deem necessary provider . Narcotic use centrally act muscle relaxant typically encourage , time maybe necessary help control pain . For pain debilitate worsening , consultation orthopedic neurological service may consider . Musculoskeletal Obstetric Management ( MOM ) : In addition standard obstetric visit , patient group see MOM team every one two week depend severity symptom . We find treat pregnancy-related pain visit every one two week sufficient majority case mild moderate presentation non-inflammatory pain . A standard history take patient assessed musculoskeletal condition identify sign serious illness , neurological deficit and/or orthopedic instability . If condition evident , patient immediately referred specialist consultation . The patient MOM group treat biobehavioral management , manual therapy spinal stabilization exercise describe detail . The obstetric physician chiropractic physician coordinate schedule clinic . For pain debilitate worsening , consultation orthopedic neurological service consider . Patients assess 33 week gestation 3 month post-partum research end-points collect . Please see next cell detailed description functional endurance test well self report test .
DOC.criteria: Female Patients 1545 year age Pregnant 2428 week gestation LBP and/or PP History fracture , neoplasm , previous surgery lumbar spine , pelvis , hip femur Acute inflammatory infectious disease Chronic pain prior pregnancy ( pain persist > 8 week prior pregnancy ) Mental health disorder require medication/treatment Back pain visceral diseases Peripheral vascular disease and/or cardiac disease require medical treatment Severe disable health problem Substance abuse Ongoing treatment back pain health care provider Pending current litigation Multiple birth pregnancy
